tool_description: Unlock valuable data and make informed business decisions with just an email address.
name: Business E-Mail Resolution
title: Business E-Mail Resolution

api_list.name: /email/info
api_list.description:
Returns basic information for the company behind the given email address.
IMPORTANT: This endpoint invokes real-time crawlings and calculations and the response time can be up to 10 seconds per call.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://business-e-mail-resolution.p.rapidapi.com/email/info"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "business-e-mail-resolution.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://business-e-mail-resolution.p.rapidapi.com/email/info"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

print(response.json())
